channel.title: ddg onion frequent 400 bad request searches , on 2nd attempt they work , normal?
channel.description:
ddg onion frequent 400 bad request searches , on 2nd attempt they work , normal again, search goes through
anyone else noticing this ?
this has been going on for some weeks/months on whonix 14 all updated, qubes

item.title: ddg onion frequent 400 bad request searches , on 2nd attempt they work , normal?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
It’s been a thing since they upgraded the core to Firefox Quantum. This is best reported to upstream Tor Browser because it’s not Whonix specific and we don’t modify it in any way.

Read full topic
